title: [Feature] Shopping List Wizard
body:
**Description**
Build an interactive shopping list builder that helps users create custom shopping lists based on their experience level, budget, and display goals.

**User Flow**
1. User takes a quick survey (experience level, budget range, display size goals, location)
2. System recommends specific products with quantities
3. User can customize/adjust recommendations
4. Export shopping list (printable, shareable link)

**Key Features**
- Beginner/Intermediate/Advanced packages
- Budget calculator with running total
- Prop suggestions based on yard size
- Quantity estimator based on display goals
- Vendor comparison for same products
- Seasonal recommendations (Halloween vs Christmas starter kits)

**Technical Considerations**
- Could use local storage to save progress
- Consider affiliate links for revenue
- Mobile-friendly interface essential
